group_1.narration: Unlike us, Mihono currently@lives out in Kamihama by herself,@but she's still our underclassman here at Kosho School,@and our families are close neighbors as well.
She returns to her family's house on weekends,@and it wouldn't surprise anyone if@we had been friends with her@for longer than we actually have been.

group_1.textRight: (But in actuality, we only started hanging out with@Mihono...)
(...after the three of us became Magical Girls@together.)

group_1.textLeft: Hmm. Is there something troubling you,@Kira-senpai?
Then without further ado, Mihono shall return to@her film-viewing!

group_1.narration: Neither I nor Komachi interact all that much@with others, and we're not fond of others@trying to get to know us in a hurry.@So we've gotten along well together for quite some time.
Meanwhile, Mihono is outgoing and social.@She may seem like the total opposite of us,@but strangely enough,@spending time with her doesn't feel unpleasant at all.
That's because Mihono takes care@to meet us where we're at.
I remember something@Komachi said to her once before.

group_1.textLeft: ...You know, Mihono, you're surprisingly considerate@of those around you.

group_1.textRight: You can't film a movie with a crew of just one,@after all!

group_1.textCenter: (If you want to be a film director, you've got to be@someone who attracts company...)
(Every action Mihono takes is linked to her future@dream.)
(Both Komachi and I got roped into Mihono's@film-making before we even knew it, too.)

group_1.textLeft: ...By the way, Kira.@How has the script been going since then?
I can search for more resources if you need any...
Why wasn't that the first thing you told me today,@honestly?!
Not that I'm complaining about it being done!

group_1.textRight: You have the original story to thank for that.@It was practically a film plot already.
Can I count on you to check it for historical accuracy@later today, Komachi?

group_1.textLeft: Roger that. How about you, Mihono?

group_1.textRight: I've pinned down a Western mansion that feels just@perfect for our filming location.
Also, since I've contacted the student council and@received an additional budget for filming,
I've been able to upgrade all of our filming and@editing equipment...
...as well as rent out all the sets and props@we'll need at highly affordable rates!

group_1.textLeft: Extra budget? For a club that's already struggling@with the budget for next year...?

group_1.textRight: You're not blackmailing the student council@president, are you?
All I did was submit the film proposal to them,@just as I was told.

group_1.textLeft: ...How enormous of a proposal did you give them?
Well, we've established that you're a ruthless@businesswoman, if nothing else...

group_1.textRight: But the bar's been raised that much higher now.

group_1.textLeft: No matter how high it is, we simply need to leap@over it!
...All that's left is casting our actors, yes?
So without further ado, I'll start reading through@Kira-sensei's book!

group_1.textRight: That would be the script. It's industry lingo.
